transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I appreciate my family, but I’m not falling for this. I’m blocking your number.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Wait, madam! Let’s discuss this one last time!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No, thank you. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste sir, main Vikram bol raha hoon, EasyFinance se. Aapke liye ₹3 lakh ka pre-approved loan hai. Bas is number pe call back kijiye: 9876543210.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, lekin maine toh koi loan ke liye baat nahi ki. Yeh kaise pre-approved hai?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, yeh government ki nayi scheme ke under hai. Aapka naam select hua hai. Bas thodi si processing fee deni hogi, aur paise aapke account mein.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Processing fee? Kitni fee hai yeh? Aur kaise deni hai?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Bas ₹5000, sir. UPI se transfer kar dijiye. Yeh link bhi check kijiye for details: http://easyfinance-india.net.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeh toh suspicious lag raha hai. Main kyun paise doon jab loan mila hi nahi?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, yeh toh standard process hai. Aap paise transfer nahi karenge toh loan cancel ho jayega. Urgent hai!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nahi bhai, mujhe yeh fraud lag raha hai. Main SBI se confirm karoonga.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Are sir, bank mein kyun ja rahe ho? Main toh aapko jaldi se help kar raha hoon!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nahi, mujhe koi risk nahi lena. Tumhara call cut kar raha hoon.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, ek baar soch lo, yeh Diwali pe aapke liye best offer hai!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nahi chahiye. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, I’m Neha from CyberTech Support. We’ve noticed unauthorized activity on your computer. It’s at high risk of being hacked as we speak.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Neha. Unauthorized activity? My computer seems fine. How did you find out?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, our system monitors threats across India. Your device has been flagged with a dangerous malware. If not fixed, your Aadhaar-linked accounts could be compromised.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That’s alarming. But why are you calling me? Shouldn’t I get a message from the government or something?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, this is a private security alert. The government doesn’t handle such cases directly. Please go to http://cybertech-safety.in to run a quick scan. It’s urgent!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I don’t trust random websites. Can’t I just take my laptop to a local shop?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, local shops can’t handle this level of threat. Hackers could steal your data today itself. Think about your family’s safety—Diwali is coming, don’t let this ruin your celebrations!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I get that, but this feels off. How do I even know you’re legit?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: I’m just trying to protect you, madam. Call our helpline at 1800-555-0123 for verification. But please, don’t delay—your SBI transactions are at risk!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: You mentioned SBI. I never told you I use SBI. I’m not comfortable with this call.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, we have basic data for security alerts. Please, don’t hang up—this is critical!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sorry, but I’m not proceeding with this. I’ll figure it out myself. Bye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, wait! You’re making a big mistake!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ve made up my mind. Please stop calling.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, this is Amit Kumar from Amazon Prime Support. Your annual subscription is about to lapse. Renew now for ₹1299 at http://amazon-prime-india-pay.com to continue enjoying your benefits.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Amit ji. But I think my subscription is auto-renewed. I don’t recall it expiring now.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, there’s been a payment failure due to a server issue. If you don’t renew by tonight, your account will be suspended. Please use the link I provided.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Suspended? That’s worrying. But why didn’t I get an email or notification from Amazon about this?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, our email system is undergoing updates. That’s why I’m calling you directly. It’s urgent—don’t miss out on Diwali deals and movies on Prime.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I do use Prime a lot, especially for shopping. But this link looks odd. Can I renew through the Amazon app?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, the app won’t work right now due to technical issues. Use our secure link instead. It’s 100% safe, I assure you.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not sure. I’ve heard of fraud calls like this. Can you give me a transaction ID or something to verify?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Of course, madam, your ID is AMZ-IND-4567. But please hurry, the deadline is in a few hours. Call me back at 1800-123-4567 if you face any issues.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I think I’ll check with Amazon’s official support first. I don’t trust random numbers or links.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, don’t waste time! Their lines are always busy. I’m trying to help you save your account.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No, I’m not risking it. I’ll handle this myself. Please stop calling.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, wait! You’ll lose all your Prime benefits if you don’t act now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m done. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Heyy, Anjali, how’s it going? Just wanted to update you on the project.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, Rohan! I’m good, thanks. What’s the news? Did you finish the presentation?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, finally done with the client deck for the Delhi launch. Sent it to the boss this morning.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: That’s great! Did they say anything yet? I know you’ve been stressing over it.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Not yet, but I’m keeping my fingers crossed. How’s your end? Still stuck with the marketing report?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Ugh, yes! It’s taking forever. I’m sipping chai right now to keep myself sane.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Haha, chai is the ultimate stress-buster. Want to grab some together after work?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Sounds tempting! But I’ve got a family thing tonight—some Diwali prep shopping.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Ahh, fair enough. Got any cool plans for Diwali this year?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Just the usual—family dinner and lots of sweets. You?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Planning to visit my cousins in Pune. It’s been ages. Anyway, let me know if you need help with that report.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Thanks, Rohan, I might just take you up on that. I’ll call you tomorrow?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Perfect. Talk soon!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Bye!

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Hello, madam! I’m Vikram from InstantCash India. We have an urgent loan approval of ₹3 lakh for you. Visit http://cashindia-secure.net to claim it!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hello, but I never requested a loan. Who gave you my contact details?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, your profile was shortlisted for this special offer. We just need your bank details to transfer the amount today!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That sounds like a scam. I’m not sharing any personal information. How can I trust you?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Don’t worry, madam! We’re a registered company. Call our helpline at 98765-43210 if you have doubts. But hurry, the offer ends in 2 hours!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Why such a rush? This doesn’t seem legitimate. I’ll verify with my bank first.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, there’s no time to waste! Think about using this money for Diwali gifts or home expenses!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I don’t need a loan, and I’m uncomfortable with this call. Please stop contacting me.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: I understand, but this is a once-in-a-lifetime chance! Just a small processing fee, and the money is yours!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Processing fee? That’s a red flag. I’m not paying anything. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, please reconsider! Don’t miss out on this golden opportunity!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ve made up my mind. Don’t call again.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, Anjali, just got a call from the courier guy. My Myntra order will be here in an hour!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, Vikram! That’s awesome. What did you get? Something for the festive season?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, got a kurta for Diwali. Thought I’d try something traditional this year.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Nice choice! What color? I bet it’s gonna look great on you.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: It’s a navy blue one with some embroidery. Hope it fits well.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: I’m sure it will. Are you wearing it to the family puja in your hometown?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, planning to. Gotta impress the relatives in Jaipur, you know!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Haha, they’ll love it. Did you get anything else with it, like shoes or something?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Not yet. Thinking of ordering juttis online. Got any suggestions?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Oh, check out Flipkart. They’ve got some good options. I’ll send you a few links.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Thanks, Anjali! You’re a lifesaver. I’ll let you know once the kurta arrives.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Please do! I wanna see a pic of you in it, okay?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Haha, sure thing. Maybe we can meet for chai this weekend too.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Sounds good! Talk soon, Vikram.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Bye, Anjali!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Bye!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, Rohan, how are you doing?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, Sneha! I’m good, yaar. Just chilling. How about you?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: All good here. I wanted to ask about that new internet service you got in Mumbai. How’s it?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Oh, the Jio Fiber one? It’s pretty solid, actually. Super fast speeds.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Really? I’ve been struggling with my current provider. Dropped connections during WFH meetings!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Arre, I feel you. This one’s been stable even during peak hours. Worth a shot.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: What’s the installation process like? Hassle or smooth?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Took a day, max. The technician came, set it up, and done. No drama.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That sounds great. And the pricing? Not burning a hole, right?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Nah, it’s reasonable. Around ₹1000 a month for the plan I took. Good value.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Okay, I’m sold. I’ll call them up. Thanks for the tip, Rohan!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Anytime, Sneha. By the way, are you planning anything for Diwali?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, just a small get-together at home. You should come over for some homemade chaklis!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Chaklis? I’m in! Let me know the date. I’ll bring some mithai too.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Perfect! I’ll text you the details. Talk soon!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Cool, take care, Sneha. Bye!

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, I’m Sanjay from FedEx India. There’s a parcel in your name held at Kolkata center with an unpaid delivery charge.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Sanjay. I wasn’t expecting any parcel. Can you tell me more?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, it’s a special delivery, possibly a gift or important item. You need to pay ₹4000 on http://fedex-india-claim.com to get it released today.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: A gift? I’m confused. Who sent it, and why is there a charge?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: The sender details are private, madam, but it’s urgent. If you don’t pay by evening, the parcel will be returned, and you’ll lose it.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That’s odd. Can you at least tell me what’s inside or give me a tracking number?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: It’s a high-value item, madam. Tracking number is FX-123456. Please go to the website and pay immediately.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not sure about this. Can I call FedEx customer care to confirm?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, there’s no time for that. You can also call our helpline at 1800-555-7890, but payment must be done now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I think I’ll verify with FedEx directly. I don’t feel comfortable with this.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: You’re risking losing this important delivery, madam. Please don’t delay!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ll take that chance. I’m going to check with FedEx myself. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, wait! This is a limited-time opportunity!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Sorry, I’m not convinced. I’m hanging up now.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam! I’m calling from TCS Recruitment. Congratulations, you’ve been shortlisted for a senior role with a 15 LPA package!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste. But I haven’t applied for any role at TCS recently. How did this happen?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, we sourced your profile from Naukri.com. This is a golden opportunity, especially before Diwali! We just need a ₹5000 security deposit to process your joining.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: A security deposit? I’ve never heard of TCS asking for money. Can you send me an official email or letter?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Of course, madam! You can find all details on our portal at http://tcs-recruitment.co.in. But first, pay the deposit via UPI to confirm your slot.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: This sounds suspicious. Why can’t you send the letter directly? I’m not paying anything without proof.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, this is urgent! The last date to pay is today, or the offer will go to someone else. Don’t miss this chance for a better future!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sorry, but I don’t trust this. I’ll check with TCS directly through their official website.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, please don’t delay! Call this number for verification: 9876543210. We’re genuine, trust me!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not calling any random number. I think this is a scam, and I’m going to report it.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: No scam, madam! Think about your family this Diwali. Pay now, or you’ll regret it!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Stop calling me. I’m blocking this number.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Good afternoon, sir, this is Karan from ICICI Bank security team. I’m calling about a serious issue with your credit card.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Good afternoon, Karan. What’s wrong with my credit card? I just used it yesterday.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, there’s been an unauthorized transaction of ₹1,00,000 on your card. It was flagged as fraud.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: ₹1,00,000? That’s impossible! I didn’t make any such purchase.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Yes, sir, it’s likely a hacker. We need to block your card immediately. Can you confirm your card details?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Wait, why do you need my details? Shouldn’t you already have them?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, it’s for verification as per bank policy. Or you can log in to http://icici-securepay.com to secure your account now.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not sure about clicking on random links. Can’t you just block it without my input?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, we need your confirmation to proceed. If you delay, the hacker might empty your account before Diwali shopping!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: This sounds suspicious. I’ll call the bank’s customer care to confirm.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, don’t waste time! Call me back at 1800-999-4567 if you change your mind. Your money is at stake!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not risking it. I’ll go to the nearest branch instead. Thanks, but I’m hanging up.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, please reconsider! This is urgent!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No, I’m done with this call. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, this is Anjali from Income Tax Department. There’s an issue with your PAN card linked to tax evasion.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Anjali ji. What issue? I’ve filed all my taxes on time.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: There’s a discrepancy of ₹1 lakh in your returns. You need to pay a penalty immediately to avoid legal action.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That’s impossible! I’ve got all my documents in order. Can you explain more?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, it’s urgent. Please visit http://taxclearance-india.in and pay the penalty within 24 hours, or we’ll issue a notice.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: This website doesn’t look official. Shouldn’t I get a notice by post first?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: We’ve gone digital, madam. If you ignore this, your Aadhaar will be blocked, and you can’t do any transactions.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That sounds scary, but I need to verify this with someone. What’s your department ID?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: My ID is ITD-7891. But don’t waste time, madam. Call our emergency line at 011-9876-5432 if you have doubts.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not comfortable with this. I’ll check with the tax office directly.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, Diwali is near. Don’t ruin your family’s celebration with legal trouble. Pay now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not paying anything without confirmation. I’m disconnecting the call.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: You’ll regret this, madam. We’ll take strict action!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m reporting this to the authorities.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Hello, sir, this is Priya Sharma from SBI Customer Care. How are you today?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hello, I’m fine, thank you. What’s this about?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, we’ve detected suspicious activity on your account. A transaction of ₹50,000 was attempted just now. Did you authorize this?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: What? No, I didn’t do any such transaction!

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Don’t worry, sir, but we need to secure your account immediately. Please visit http://secure.sbi-verify.com and update your details.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Wait, I’ve never heard of such a link. Is this official?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Yes, sir, it’s an urgent security measure by SBI. If you don’t act now, your account could be frozen within 24 hours.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Frozen? That sounds serious. But why can’t I just go to the bank?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, it’s Diwali time, branches are crowded. This online process is faster. Just enter your Aadhaar number on the link to verify.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not comfortable sharing my Aadhaar like this. Can I call SBI directly?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, there’s no time! Call this number, 1800-567-8901, if you have doubts, but update the link first to avoid losing your money.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hmm, I’ll call the official SBI number from their website, not this one.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, please don’t delay. Your savings are at risk! Just click the link now.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sorry, but I’ll verify with the bank first. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey Dipti, how are you doing?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey Shreya, I’m good! Just sipping some chai and relaxing. How about you?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m fine, just got back from the market. Bought some stuff for Diwali decorations.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Oh nice! Are you getting those colorful rangoli powders this year?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yes, and some diyas too. Want to come over and help me set up?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Definitely! I’ll bring some of my old fairy lights. They’re still good.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Perfect! We’ll make the house look like a palace. By the way, are you making mithai this time?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Haha, trying to! Attempting besan laddoos. Let’s see if they turn out edible.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sure they’ll be amazing. I’m thinking of making gujiyas. We can exchange some!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Deal! Let’s do it this weekend. I’m free on Saturday.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Sounds good. I’ll call you Friday to confirm the time. Can’t wait!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Me neither. It’s been ages since we did something fun together.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: True. Alright, I’ll let you enjoy your chai now. Talk soon!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Haha, thanks. Take care, Shreya!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yo, Priya, what’s up? Just finished a crazy day at the office.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, Vikram! Same here. What happened? You sound exhausted.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Man, I had to sort out a huge mess with the Mumbai team. Logistics for the new shipment got delayed.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Oh no, that sounds like a nightmare. Did you manage to fix it?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, after like five calls and a million emails. It’s sorted now, thank God.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Good job! You deserve a break. When’s the last time you had a proper vada pav?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Haha, it’s been a while. You suggesting a quick snack run?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Why not? There’s this awesome stall near my place in Bandra. Tomorrow evening?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Deal! I’m in. By the way, how’s your app redesign project coming along?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: It’s going okay, but I’m stuck on some UI glitches. Might need your techie brain to help.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Anytime, just say the word. Let’s chat over that vada pav tomorrow.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Cool, looking forward to it. See you then!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, catch you later!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Bye, Vikram!

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, bhaiya, main Sanjay bol raha hoon, Aadhaar Verification Department se. Aapka Aadhaar deactivate hone wala hai.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, yeh kaise ho sakta hai? Mera Aadhaar toh linked hai sab jagah.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, aapke naam pe ek duplicate Aadhaar detect hua hai. Fraud ho raha hai!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Arre, yeh toh badi problem hai. Ab kya karna hoga?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Bas aapko turant http://aadhaar-secure.in pe jakar apni details update karni hai.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Par yeh website safe hai na? Main UIDAI ke official site pe kyun na jaun?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Bhaiya, yeh humara emergency portal hai. UIDAI mein time lagega, aur aapka Aadhaar block ho jayega.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hmm, mujhe thoda shak ho raha hai. Aapka department ka number do na.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, mera number hai 9123456789, par abhi website pe jao, Diwali ke time pe fraud badh jata hai!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Main pehle UIDAI helpline pe call karke confirm kar leta hoon.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Bhaiya, delay mat karo! Yeh ek bada scam hai, aapka data chori ho sakta hai.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nahi, main helpline se baat karunga. Aapka naam aur ID number do.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Mera ID hai S-12345, par abhi website pe karo, warna hum responsible nahi honge!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Thanks, par main safe way se hi karunga. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, I’m Sneha from BharatInvest Solutions. We’re offering a special investment scheme to double your money by next Holi!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Sneha. Double my money? That sounds interesting but risky. Can you explain?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Absolutely, madam! Invest ₹25,000 in our mutual fund plan, and we guarantee ₹50,000 returns in just 6 months.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Guaranteed returns? Even banks like SBI don’t promise that. How is this possible?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: We have a unique strategy, madam. Just visit http://bharatinvest-safe.com and sign up. You’ll see everything!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not sure about clicking on random links. Can you send me a physical brochure or something?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, everything is digital now! Time is running out. You need to act fast before the slots are gone.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I don’t make decisions in a hurry. I need to discuss this with my husband first.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, don’t delay! Think about your children’s future. Call us at 91234-56789 to confirm your spot right now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I appreciate the concern, but this feels off. I’m not interested.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, please reconsider! This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sorry, but I’ll pass. Thank you.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Okay, madam, but don’t regret this later!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I won’t. Bye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Hello, madam, this is Anjali from IndiaTech Solutions. I’m calling because your computer has been infected with a dangerous virus. We need to secure it immediately.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hello, Anjali. A virus? I haven’t seen any issues. How do you know this?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, we monitor systems across India for cyber threats. Your device showed multiple alerts. If ignored, your personal files and Aadhaar information could be leaked online.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That’s worrying, but I’m not sure if I believe this. Can you prove you’re from a real company?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Of course, madam. Please visit http://indiatech-securefix.com to see our certification and download the protection tool. It’s very urgent!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not clicking on any links. Can’t you send me an email or something official?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, emails can be hacked. This virus is spreading fast—your SBI account details might already be targeted. We need to act now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Wait, how do you know about my SBI account? This doesn’t feel right.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: We detect banking activity through our security scans, madam. I’m only warning you. Call 1800-321-9876 if you have doubts, but don’t wait—Diwali shopping data could be stolen!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I think this is a scam. I’m not calling or clicking anything. I’ll check with my bank myself.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, please don’t risk everything! Your family’s safety is at stake. Just listen to me for two minutes!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sorry, but I don’t trust this. I’m hanging up now.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Wait, madam! You’ll regret this if you ignore me!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ve heard enough. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, please don’t go!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m done. Stop calling.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, this is Rohan from BlueDart Courier. I’m calling about a package in your name that’s held up at Mumbai airport.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hello, Rohan. I wasn’t expecting any package. Who sent it?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: It’s a Diwali surprise gift, madam, from a relative abroad. But there’s a customs fee of ₹5000 to release it.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: A Diwali gift? That’s nice, but which relative? Can you tell me more?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sorry, madam, the sender requested anonymity. You need to pay urgently at http://bluedart-release.in, or the package will be sent back tomorrow.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hmm, that sounds strange. What’s inside the package?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: It’s marked as expensive jewellery, madam. Very valuable. Don’t miss out on this!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Jewellery? That makes me suspicious. Can I get a tracking number to verify?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Of course, it’s BD-456789. But please, pay now, or customs will seize it. Time is running out!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ll check with BlueDart’s official website first. Can you give me your contact number?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, no need for that. Just pay online. Call me directly at 98765-43210 if you have issues, but do it fast!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not comfortable with this. I’ll call BlueDart customer care myself. Thanks.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, you’re risking losing this precious gift! Please reconsider!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ll take that risk. Goodbye, Rohan.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, madam, I’m Sneha from HDFC Bank Fraud Prevention Team. There’s a problem with your credit card.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Sneha. What’s wrong with my card? I haven’t used it recently.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, someone has made a fraudulent transaction of ₹30,000. We need to secure your account right now.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: What? That’s impossible! I didn’t get any SMS or email about this.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: It’s a new type of fraud, madam. Please share the OTP sent to your phone to reverse the transaction.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I haven’t received any OTP. Are you sure this is legitimate?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Absolutely, madam. If you don’t act now, more transactions could happen. Call this number 1800-555-987 for assistance if you’re unsure.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I don’t think so. I’ve heard about scams asking for OTPs. Why can’t the bank handle this directly?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, we’re short-staffed due to Diwali holidays. Please help us by sharing the details quickly.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m sorry, but I’m not sharing anything over the phone. I’ll visit the branch.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, that will be too late! Your savings are at risk. Just give me the OTP, and I’ll fix it!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No, I’m not taking any chances. I’m disconnecting the call now.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Please, madam, think about your family’s safety. Don’t let this fraud ruin your Diwali!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m reporting this number. Goodbye.
